detail_desc: Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and slim legs.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a lined funnel collar with a decorative drawstring at the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted running top in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated hood, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length dress in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide, relaxed fit with a small collar, and a V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Short, detachable, V-neck underdress in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots with satin linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 10.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif. Round neckline, short sleeves, and rounded and longer at the back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with fake welt pockets at the back. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side, and slim legs with creases.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Smocking at the front and back of the bodice and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in soft, printed stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Fitted top in sturdy, stretch microfibre with narrow shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. Wide elastic waistband.

Soft, non-wired bra top in lace and jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and side support. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Thin bomber jacket in satin with appliqués. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in marled cotton jersey with a collar, no buttons and slits in the sides.

Jeans in stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with covered elastication at the waist and a small frill trim at the top. Fake fly, side and back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Braided elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline and slits at the hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.
Suede belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Short dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck with lacing. Frill trim over the shoulders, short sleeves with frill trims and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of joggers in soft fabric. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Jeans in coated stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise on the front of the bodice and down the sleeves. Round neckline, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the hems. Seam with a small frill trim at the waist, and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Sports vest tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Shorter, fitted top in a fine rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and raw-edge hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves in a tapered fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One pair in a cable knit and one pair in a rib knit.
Short, V-neck yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a wrapover and open section at the back. Long ties at the hem.
Slightly longer shirt in crisp cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust.
Short, flared dress in a cotton weave with elastication around the top, short, wide flounced sleeves and side pockets. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 9M-4Y) and ribbed hems.
Vest top in crêped jersey with raw, scalloped edges.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton. Jumper with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and raw, roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and raw, roll-edge hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with adjustable straps that button at the front and ribbed side sections. Kangaroo pocket with appliqués and a print motif, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Top in a crinkled, printed viscose weave with a V-neck, lacing at the front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Leggings in stretch denim with elastication and a press-stud at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar and detachable shoulder tabs. Pockets in the sides, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sandals in imitation leather with scalloped, crossover foot straps and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft wool and alpaca blend with a lightly brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with ribbed sections, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in supersoft stretch denim with worn details, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Front and back pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and patch front pockets. No buttons.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Set with a shirt and shorts in a cotton weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Shorts with detachable elastic braces, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and fake side pockets.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with a faux fur trim at the top of the shaft and lacing with a drawstring at the front. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, textured knit with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the shoulders and back of the neck. Short cap sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Two-tone leather boots with square toes and a high shaft with a seam at the back and concealed zip in one side. Leather linings, insoles and soles. Heel approx. 7 cm.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons at the front and high slits in the sides.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length boiler suit in an airy cotton weave with a resort collar, chest pockets and an elasticated waist. Buttons down the front and half-length sleeves with sewn-in turn ups.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
